value.title: University of Limerick invites applications for MSc in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning through Fateh Education
value.excerpt: University of Limerick, Ireland is now inviting applications for its MSc program in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. The course aims to provide students with core knowledge of artificial intelligence technology (AI).

value.title: Stop your public-cloud AI projects from dripping you dry

value.title: Lensa AI climbs the App Store charts as its ‘magic avatars’ go viral
value.excerpt: The current No. 1 App Store photo app, Lensa AI uses the Stable Diffusion deep learning model to generate artsy "magic avatars" for consumers.

value.title: AI will thrive in 3 key areas in 2023, despite economic conditions

value.title: Operationalize your Amazon SageMaker Studio notebooks as scheduled notebook jobs

value.title: Facial strain sensor could give a voice to the voiceless
value.excerpt: While some assistance is available to individuals who lack the power of speech, verbally communicating with other people can still be challenging. A new face-worn strain sensor could help, as it's able to "read" the wearer's silently mouthed words.

value.title: AI could have 20% chance of sentience in 10 years, says philosopher David Chalmers
value.excerpt: AI programs that combine sensing and action and world models might achieve fish-level intelligence, says the NeurIPS 2022 keynote speaker.

value.title: Artificial intelligence and robotics to help early detect urinary tract infections
value.excerpt: A team of researchers at the University of Edinburgh and Heriot-Watt University are developing AI and robots to detect urinary tract infections (UTIs) earlier.

value.title: New Orleans reverses facial recognition ban to help police fight crime; privacy experts are wary

value.title: N-iX obtains the Modernization of Web Applications to Microsoft Azure Advanced Specialization
value.excerpt: N-iX, a leading European software development company, has earned the Modernization of Web Applications to Microsoft Azure advanced specialization. It is a validation of the company's deep knowledge and extensive experience in migrating and modernizing production web application workloads and managing app services in Azure.

value.title: AI Is Coming for the Thought Leaders
value.excerpt: Robots were considered capable only of unimaginative, routine work. Today they write articles and create award-winning art.

value.title: The Pros And Cons Of Artificial Intelligence
value.excerpt: Artificial intelligence, or AI, is everywhere right now. In truth, the fundamentals of AI and machine learning have been around for a long time. The first primitive form of AI was an automated checkers bot which was created by Cristopher Strachey from the University of Manchester, England, back in 1951.

value.title: AWS updates its machine learning service SageMaker

value.title: DigiYatra facial recognition system launches at airports: How this will change security
value.excerpt: DigiYatra, the brainchild of the Ministry of Civil Aviation, allows airline passengers to be automatically processed based on a facial recognition system at several checkpoints including entry, security check and boarding aircraft.

value.title: Mastering Stratego, the classic game of imperfect information
value.excerpt: Game-playing artificial intelligence (AI) systems have advanced to a new frontier. Stratego, the classic board game that’s more complex than chess and Go, and craftier than poker, has now been mastered.
